abstracts.cdata!:
The Economic Reform Technical Assistance
            Project for Nepal aims to support the implementation of key
            short term measures of the reform agenda as embodied in the
            Royal Proclamation, the 21-point program, and the PRS. The
            Nepal Economic Reform Technical Assistance Project (NERTA)
            should be structured to provide flexibility in sourcing and
            building capacity. During the preparation and appraisal
            meetings, Bank support was requested in the following areas;
            (i) improving governance and public sector management; (ii)
            accelerating privatization; (iii) improving service
            delivery; and (iv) implementing a strategic communications
            program. A brief overview of support in each of these areas
            is presented below. It is proposed that these areas form the
            areas of pre-identified technical assistance while the
            remainder of the resources is placed in a challenge fund.
